Text: sleazeboy!  Thankz so much for posting this.  This is definitely my fav audio post on PB so far.  I haven't heard these boyz since my college dayz.  I had Young and Crazy on LP and had a ton of fun jamming to them back then.  Now I can listen to them once, plus jam out to tunez of theirz I've never heard.  Thankz again!!!
